projects.title: Rojgaar Link
projects.summary: A full-stack job platform built with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, designed to connect Nepalese job seekers living abroad with relevant opportunities. The app features user authentication, role-based access control (admin, employer, job seeker), and secure image/file uploads using Cloudinary. Developed a responsive UI, implemented efficient CRUD operations, and ensured data integrity across all roles.

projects.title: Fetch Tube
projects.summary: A frontend-only web app built with React that allows users to download YouTube videos or Shorts in MP4 or MP3 formats across various resolutions. Users simply input a YouTube link, and the app fetches downloadable links using a free third-party API. No backend was used; all functionality is handled on the client side.
